ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank CE Beard for helpful comments and laboratory assistance and the staff of the zoos for help collecting biting midges. The South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control, courtesy of CL Evans and A Wozniak, provided equipment and materials. This is Technical Contribution No. 5505 of the Clemson University Experiment Station and is based on work supported by CSREES/USDA, under project number SC1700276.
